title: Software Engineer
descr:
In January 2017 I started working as a DSP Software Engineer at Azcom Technology:
- Lead the design and development of a sensor fusion algorithm used to improve location estimation accuracy in vehicles
- 5G-CORAL Connected Cars demo in partnership with TIM (Telecom Italia)
- NB-IoT and LTE PHY DSP development

title: M.Sc. at Politecnico di Milano
descr: In 2016 I graduated in Electronics Engineering at Politecnico di Milano (110/110)

title: Founded BeSpecular
descr:
During a class at Stanford, my team and I created BeSpecular as a class project.
Then, Stephanie and I carried on with the project. I took care of all the technology (Fullstack development, DevOps, iOS and Android app)

title: Stanford University
descr:
I went to Stanford for a Summer School on Technology Entrepreneurship.
What I liked the most? The AMAZING people from all over the World that I met there

title: B.Sc. at Politecnico di Milano
descr: I started the Bachelor of Science in Electronics Engineering at Politecnico di Milano
